title: Vehicle Data Monitoring & Control App
description: A mobile application for a semester project at my university. The app provides control over a car we made and equips the user with real-time monitoring of the data the vehicle gets from its sensors. The communication with ESP32 uses BLE (Bluetooth low energy)

title: Weather app
description: A weather app which calls OpenWeather API. Currently under reconstruction with plans to use riverpod and list of places.

title: Online Social campagne AkceptAkcja
description: A social project conudcted in the virtual space of social media (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok). It was focused on spreading awareness about problems with self-acceptance. It was conducted in Polish for a target audience of Polish young adults/teenagers, made within Zwolnieni z Teorii and with fund from The City of Warsaw granted by KIK (Klub Inteligencji Katolickiej).
technologies used: Canva, Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, Google tools
